scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:frontend && npm run deploy:netlify && npm run deploy:railway
scripts.health:backend: curl -f http://localhost:5002/api/health || echo 'Backend health check failed'
scripts.health:frontend: curl -f http://localhost:5173 || echo 'Frontend health check failed'
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:frontend: cd dweep-appeim && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'No linting configured for backend'
scripts.lint:frontend: cd dweep-appeim && npm run lint || echo 'No linting configured for frontend'
